entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain and fog beginning this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 4 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
